doc:
Marie Bell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marie_Bell 0 Marie Bell (December 23, 1900 – August 14, 1985), born Marie-Jeanne Bellon, was a French tragedian, comic actor and stage director. She was the director of the Théâtre du Gymnase in Paris from 1962 onwards, and this theatre now bears her name. Marie_Bell ( December_23_,_1900 – August_14_,_1985 ) , born Marie-Jeanne_Bellon , was a_French_tragedian , comic_actor_and_stage_director . She was the_director of the_Théâtre_du_Gymnase in Paris from 1962_onwards , and this_theatre now bears her name .
